about_the_game:
Superball is a futuristic reimagining of football with fast-paced 3v3 matches full of action. Enter the field with a team of heroes, score against the other team while defending your own goal and win! Show your skill in classic matches, battle for the top spots in ranked games and have fun in seasonal arcade modes like Dodgeball and Basketball.

Find your hero: over a dozen characters to choose from, with a new hero joining the cast every season! Each character has a unique appearance, personality and a set of abilities, complete with a powerful ultimate.

All heroes are sorted into roles: forwards, midfielders and goalkeepers. But the fun part is, you can press the attack as a massive defender hero and goal keep using a nimble striker. There are no limits and no reason to sit still!

Win with your team! Fluid controls and a quick pass system will allow you to set up skillful attacks on the opponent team’s goal.

Star appearance for star players! Level up the equipment and accessories of your heroes to create a look that is truly yours. Choose from hundreds of customization options.

Getting in the game is easy! Just select your hero and position on the field. Want to take the game to a new level? Invite 2 of your friends to complete the team and show everyone what an experienced party is capable of!

Superball is not just a game, it’s a show! Switch to observer mode and take control of the camera. Relive moments of triumph, review mistakes or even host your own tournament live, you’ve got the tools.

Want to make sure not to miss Superball? Add it to your Wishlist and stay on top of all the news!

short_description: Superball is a multiplayer 3v3 action game. An all-out blast of football in a cyberpunk setting. Choose a hero with unique abilities and conquer the sport of the future. Your accurate passes and strikes, as well as artful defense will lead your team to victory!
